original_text: And that servant who knew his master's will but did not get ready or act according to his will, will receive a severe beating.
korean_text: 주인의 뜻을 알고도 준비하지 아니하고 그 뜻대로 행하지 아니한 종은 많이 맞을 것이요

sentences.original_text: And that servant who knew his master's will
but did not get ready or act according to his will
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 준비하지 않거나 그 뜻대로 행하지 않으면
